#summary How to install
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Install GBParsy and GBParsyPy =
== Common Process ==
 # Download the compressed library.
  * [http://gbfp.googlecode.com/files/gbfp-0.5.3.tar.gz gbfp-0.5.3.tar.gz]
 # Uncompress the file into a directory which you want.
{{{
$ tar xvfz gbparsy-0.5.4.tar.gz
}}}
== Install GBParsy ==
  # Make and install the library
{{{
$ cd gbparsy-0.5.3
$ make
$ make install (as a root)
$ cd ..
}}}
== Install GBParsyPy ==
  # Make and install the module
{{{
$ cd gbparsy-0.5.3/gbparsypy
$ python setup.py build
$ python setup.py install (as a root)
$ cd ../..
}}}
